org.jacp.api.component
Interface IHandleable<A,M>

Type Parameters:
A - defines the basic action type
M - defines the basic message type
All Known Subinterfaces:
ICallbackComponent<L,A,M>, IPerspective<L,A,M>, IStateLessCallabackComponent<L,A,M>, ISubComponent<L,A,M>, IVComponent<C,L,A,M>
public interface IHandleable<A,M>

This interface defines components which are able to handle a single message.

Author:
Andy Moncsek

Method Summary
<C> C
handle(IAction<A,M> action)
          Handles component when called.
 

Method Detail

handle

<C> C handle(IAction<A,M> action)
Handles component when called. The handle method in subcomponents is always executed in a seperate thread;

Parameters:
action -
Returns:
view component
